text: John Robert Fielding (born 7 April 1982) is an English former professional footballer who played as a defender in the Football League for York City, and in non-League football for Harrogate Town. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:People from Billingham Category:English footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:York City F.C. players Category:Harrogate Town A.F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: John Fielding (footballer, born 1982)
